name: Totally Not Another Minesweeper Clone
description:
This brand new original inspiring innovative creative inventive ingenious refreshing unique variation of minesweeper is like nothing you've seen before! But honestly speaking, there's nothing much here. Unless you find a timer and the ability to do massive grids by moving the grid around to be insane, then you shouldn't really have your expectations too high.

Left Click - Open Tile

Right Click - Flag Tile

Arrow Keys - Move Grid
